The clan level can be raised. Raising clan level requires the following:
Level 1 - SP : 1,000 Adena : 150,000
Level 2 - SP: 15,000 / Adena: 300,000
Level 3 - SP: 100,000 / Item: Proof of Blood: 100
Level 4 - SP: 1,000,000 / Item: Proof of Blood: 5,000
Level 5 - SP: 5,000,000 / Item: Proof of Blood: 10,000
